ENV.FOREMAN_WORKER_NAME:
FOREMAN_WORKER_NAME Your application will be deployed in multiple instances.
Every instance will receive a FOREMAN_WORKER_NAME variable in format <process_name>.<number>.
To avoid any conflicts init any data (for example: database schema) only if FOREMAN_WORKER_NAME is equal to "web.1".web.1

NOTE.READY: Your application must write READY to the standard output after your server is ready to receive HTTP requests. Timeout is 3s.
NOTE.MULTI_INSTANCE: Your application must be stateless. Any data must be stored in a database. Don't keep any state in global variables.
